title: Stunning sea views and a comfortable and beautifully designed interior in a really nice location.
positive_txt: Ludo was so welcoming and i loved the stylish aesthetic and sea views. Quiet and set back from the road but easy and quick to reach multiple beautiful beaches and great restaurants and bars, both within walking distance and via a short tuk tuk ride. We would definitely return as it was incredible value for money and a fantastic location.

We would definitely return as it was incredible value for money and a fantastic location.

title: Exceptional
positive_txt: The place was clean, comfortable, and well located, close to the beach and restaurants, yet quiet and relaxing. The host was very friendly and helpful, making us feel welcome from the first moment. Would definitely recommend and stay here again

title: Wonderful
positive_txt:
Nice and clean hotel with good view (upper floor).
